div.bibl: Denni Hlasatel, May 20, 1921. FROM THE OFFICE OF THE BENEVOLENT SOCIETY OF COUNTRYMEN FROM PLANICE AND VICINITY

body.p: Our Bohemian countrymen contributed $254 toward the fund for the erection of a Sokolovna (Sokol Hall) in Planice, Czechoslovakia. [Names of donors are omitted in translation.]
There will be a continuation of collections and whoever wishes to contribute should send his contribution to the secretary of the collection committee.
Podporujici Spolek Planickych Krajanu a Okoli,
